document.full_text: san antonio spurs all-star forward tim duncan has a sprained left ankle and there is no timeline for his return to the lineup, the nba's first-placed team said on tuesday.
document.title: spurs' duncan out indefinitely with sprained ankle
lines_and_colors: san antonio spurs all-star forward tim duncan has a sprained left ankle and there is no timeline for his return to the lineup, the nba's first-placed team said on tuesday.
